properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 3:34AM EST until February 14 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 20 knots from the
northwest with gusts up to 24 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 6 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 8
feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI, Harbor Beach to Port
Sanilac MI and Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 10 AM EST
Thursday with the largest waves expected around 12 PM EST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM EST FRIDAY
